commenter_b: This morning someone on ABC said Trump supporters don't take him seriously. Republicans never gave President Obama a chance. commenter_b: I just got off s cruise ship..I go on a cruise every year..The amount of people in and out of the water of those pools and all the adult drunks. Scares the hell out of me..I have a 7 year old granddaughter and she can swim..but it only takes 2 seconds for a drunk to jump on her w/o supervision. .Thank god my daughter watchers her like a hawk! THEY ONLY CARE ABOUT $$$ ITS TIME FOR LIFEGUARDS AND WATCH YOUR CHILD AS WELL!!!! And all Disney hotels have LIFEGUARDS! I live near them and we take our granddaughter Isabella to one every year for her Birthday!
commenter_a: It is really no different than at a hotel. You don't have lifeguards at a hotel pool. There are signs posted that no lifeguards are on duty and parents need to watch their kids.
post_message: There are as many as 1,000 employees aboard large cruise ships, but three major cruise lines employ no lifeguards on their ships. Why not?
